SELECT aha.ACT_NAME_ actName, aha.ACT_TYPE_ actType, aha.ASSIGNEE_ assignee, aha.START_TIME_ stime, aha.END_TIME_ etime, aha.DURATION_ duration, ahc.MESSAGE_ message, CASE aha.ACT_TYPE_ WHEN 'startEvent'
THEN (SELECT su.realName FROM act_hi_identitylink ahi left JOIN system_user su on ahi.USER_ID_=su.id WHERE ahi.TYPE_='starter' AND ahi.PROC_INST_ID_=aha.PROC_INST_ID_)
ELSE
(SELECT su.realName FROM system_user su where su.id=aha.ASSIGNEE_) END assigneeName from act_hi_actinst aha LEFT JOIN act_hi_comment ahc on aha.TASK_ID_ = ahc.TASK_ID_
WHERE aha.PROC_INST_ID_=#{processInstanceId} AND aha.ACT_TYPE_!='parallelGateway'
ORDER BY actType desc,stime desc
